segments.text: Katherine ? Well , she's good at languages .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Does she know how to speak Spanish ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She knows how to speak Spanish and Japanese .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And she's good at sports , too . She knows how to play tennis and basketball .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But there's one thing she's not good at .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: She's not good at remembering things . We have a date , and she's an hour late ! !
segments.speaker: S2
